reviews.review: I LOVE this game. Sure other people are better than me, but I honestly have fun while playing this game.

É um ótimo jogo. Porém em algumas partidas você acaba sendo independente e tem de fazer todos os geradores se quiser vencer e fugir. Mas sempre tem pessoas que vão levar o assassino pra perto de você, ou que vão se matar atoa na mão do mesmo. Fora isso dá pra se divertir... o melhor mesmo é em grupo fechado, para não ter que depender dos outros e todos ajudarem.
可以 联机的话用uu加速器好一些，希望可以优化一下 优化一下这游戏必须火 现在邀请人，人进来就看不见人，真希望可以优化一下

A game where it makes me believe cardio is the most important thing to have.
O game é divertido só que também é bem frustrante pois é totalmente pay to win, os melhores sobreviventes e assassinos são vendidos separados.

Meta, and oftentimes necessary, perks locked behind paywalls (such as Save the Best for Last and Decisive Strike), extreme grind up the wazoo, and has some of the most out of touch developers that I have ever seen in a video game. They nerf things that were already bad and no one had anything against (A specific example would be Gearhead), refuse to fix major issues for months despite a majority of the community voicing their want for change (Such as killers being able to instantly remove someone from the game via moris and survivors being able to instantly escape without completing all objectives via keys, or just simply buffing extremely weak killers such as Legion and Clown, etc.), and either being vague or directly lying to their playerbase (the developers had to be pestered for months in order for them to reveal that a specific perk Thrilling Tremors, did not do what many players thought, which was allow for generator progress regression to occur in the time it was up, and acted extremely smug about it).
It is good game many up sides. Oned down side is ur mom cums in with lasgana and spills it all over compuwter  then u get flammed for being gey.  Not my words other players.
虽然bug很多，但是游戏非常不错
Chase or be chased, it's a fun game.
Cool game, lots of jump scares and witty tactics.

its a fun game, im a surv main but killer is fun too. :)

I love this game. Survivor and Killer are so fun to play. I thought I would have anxiety as a Survivor, but the heartbeat warning helps prepare you for the Killer to come after you.

A fun and interesting game.  There's so much to learn.  It can be stressful, exhilarating, funny, scary, frustrating and more.  You never know what your teammates might do, what the killer might do and for this reason, it keeps the game fresh.  An addictive game to play.  I also enjoy the challenges to give me something to work toward and to gain bloodpoints to level up my characters.
muito divertido de jogar com os amigos.
Yes super FUN!!!! FUN GAMES!!!!! But be prepared if you're not ready for toxic players

my last review was at like 275 hrs and it was not good here we are at almost 900 hrs and well its still not good. don't waste any money on this game find something better. every killer in this game now face camps and the devs do nothing to stop this no matter how many people report them. i switched over to killer and would you not guess it i run in to a hacker. the game puts me as the lowest killer possible sense i usually play survivor with the highest and i mean absolute highest survivors it has specially given the hacking aspect. so all in all matchmaking n/a, level of fun to be a survivor with face campers every match 0, its like playing warzone now, toxic and just annoying to play. i have uninstalled the game and it will never be on my pc ever again. dont do it to your self just move to the next game. lol 0/10

Gosh darnit, I love this game. It makes me really mad sometimes, but I still enjoy it. I'd recommend reading the threads/going on youtube to see what DLC is worth your time & works with your play style. I grabbed up a bunch of them & only tend to rotate between a couple killers. The community, for the most part, is really fun & enthusiastic. And let's not forget-- it's a great way to legally & safely satisfy the bloodlust that has been building beneath the surface for years.

es un juego exelente tanto para jugarlo en solitario como killer como con amigos en surv, eso si, tiene uno que otro bug pero muy rara vez te vas a topar con uno en medio de una partida, en lo personal es muy divertido, recomendado un 100%

Mi piace molto. Il livello di ansia e panico è incredibile. Tutti gli assassini e i sopravvissuti hanno caratteristiche diverse. Gli oggetti che decidiamo di portare in partita, vengono persi se moriamo. Ogni nuovo livello raggiunto dal personaggio regala alcuni oggetti che bisogna scegliere con cura.  Bellissimo :)  Ps. Un po' meno bello per chi non ha riflessi pronti.
L'unico grande problema è che pesa 33 Gb veramente troppo!!!!
beside horrible time for matchmaking i love the game. although i feel that survivors are catered to. Just my opinion tho.
ótimo jogo, mas é preferível jogar com amigos

Ein gutes "Horror" Game, es ist zwar nicht so gruselig aber ist eine schöne Abwechslung zu anderen Games.
Noch mehr Spaß macht es mit Freunden.

Auch nach dem HUD/UI Update, ist dieses Spiel - auch wenn manche haten, wie das mittlerweile leider normal geworden ist - ein großartiges, spannendes und Adrenalin geladenes spiel, welches ich jedem Horror-Multiplayer-Spiel-Liebhaber empfehlen würde. Nicht nur weil Behaviour Interacive Inc. immer wieder ikonische Horror-Charaktere wie Freddy Krüger oder Pyramidhat von Silent Hill in das Spiel implementieren.

Natürlich hat dieses Spiel, wie jedes andere Mehrspieler-Spiel auch seine Balancing Probleme, an denen immer wieder gearbeitet wird.

Letzten Endes kommt es auf den Spielspaß an, der definitiv gegenüber den kleinen Macken überwiegt.

Malgré le côté fun de ce jeux en coop, il reste par moments buggé et les it-box sont hasardeuses et favorisent souvent le tueur...
Si vous ne voulez pas vous ruiner ni rager dû aux bugs, je ne vous le conseille pas car il est difficile de tomber sur un tueur fairplay.
J'y joue qu'avec des personnes que je connais la plus part du temps, au moins le fun existe. Le reste du temps le jeu en solo (en temps que survivant) est bien moins fun...
